mapper.select: select * from board_usual order by bGroup desc, bOrder limit ${starting}, ${pagePerNum}
mapper.update: update board_usual set bTitle=#{bTitle}, bContent=#{bContent} where bId=#{bId}
mapper.insert: insert board_usual (bId, bUserId, bUsername, bTitle, bContent, bGroup, bOrder, bIndent, bHit, bGood, bHate) values (${bId}, #{bUserId}, #{bUsername}, #{bTitle}, #{bContent}, ${bGroup}, ${bOrder}, ${bIndent}, ${bHit}, ${bGood}, ${bHate})
mapper.update: update board_usual set bOrder = bOrder+1 where bGroup=${bGroup} and bOrder > ${bOrder}
